event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair action to replace the affected Field Replaceable Unit (FRU), the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: A Clock chip has detected a lack of connectivity between the base cabinet and the expansion cabinet.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
A Clock chip has detected a lack of connectivity between the base cabinet and the expansion cabinet.

This fault can only occur on the active Clock Unit of the SPARC Enterprise M9000-64 platform.

The Clock Unit with the fault and its partner Clock Unit on the expansion cabinet
are deconfigured and the standby Clock Unit becomes the active Clock Unit.

   If the fault is detected on the active Clock Unit and the standby Clock Unit is:

      Operational, then the platform will be reset;
      Non-Operational, then the platform will be powered down and becomes unbootable.


If this event occurs during initial installation or during repair activities,
then it's most likely due to the Clock cable.

If this event occurs on a platform that is currently in service,
then the fault is likely due to the Clock Unit.


The recommended service action for this event is to schedule the replacement of the affected FRU.


   LEGEND

    RED      = SUNW-MSG-ID
    BLUE    = EVENT_ID
    GREEN = FRU


Step 1. Collect the fault message (use one of the following methods):


   Single-line fault message displayed on the XSCF console:

   Apr 12 16:36:14 san-dc3-1-0 fmd: SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12, CSN: BE80601000  
   EVENT-ID: ad4906dd-3271-4921-8404-743875ee6f71
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/ SCF-8000-2Y for detailed information.


   Complete fault message using 'fmdump -m' on the XSCF console:

   MSG-ID:  SCF-8000-2Y, TYPE: Fault, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Critical    
   EVENT-TIME: Thu Apr 12 16:36:13 PDT 2007
   PLATFORM: SPARC-Enterprise, CSN: BE80601000, HOSTNAME: san-dc3-1-0    
   SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12    
   EVENT-ID: ad4906dd-3271-4921-8404-743875ee6f71 
   DESC: A Clock chip has detected a lack of connectivity between the base cabinet
   and the expansion cabinet.
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8000-2Y for more information.
   AUTO-RESPONSE: The entire platform is reset and the active Clock Units are deconfigured
   during recovery.
   IMPACT: The entire platform is reset and the active Clock Units are deconfigured
   during recovery.  
   REC-ACTION: Schedule a repair action to replace the affected Field Replaceable Unit (FRU),
   the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID.    
   Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.


Step 2. Collect the output from the 'fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID' command
 

   SPARC Enterprise platform example:
 
   xscf> fmdump -v -u ad4906dd-3271-4921-8404-743875ee6f71

         TIME                 UUID                                 MSG-ID
         Apr 12 16:36:13.9424 ad4906dd-3271-4921-8404-743875ee6f71 SCF-8000-2Y            
           66%  fault.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.if.fe-clk-cable                 
             
                Problem in: hc:///chassis=0/clku=2                   
                   Affects: hc:///chassis=0/clku=0                       
                       FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=BE80601000:
                                  server-id=san-dc3-1-0:serial=PP0640T634:
                                  part=CA06620-D321 A5:revision=0201/component=CLKU_B#2
            
           33%  fault.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.if.fe-clk-cable                  
              
                Problem in: hc:///chassis=0/clku=0                    
                   Affects: hc:///chassis=0/clku=0                        
                       FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=BE80601000:
                                  server-id=san-dc3-1-0:serial=PP0640T635:
                                  part=CA06620-D321 A5:revision=0201/component=/CLKU_B#0


Step 3. Contact your Authorized Service Provider.



If you require additional information, please refer to InfoDoc #87402.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: The entire platform is reset and the active Clock Units are deconfigured during recovery.
event_registry_properties.name: response
event_registry_properties.item: The entire platform is reset and the active Clock Units are deconfigured during recovery.
event_registry_properties.name: title
event_registry_properties.item: Lack of connectivity between the Clock Units on the base and expansion cabinets.
